Posts.Content:
I got the verdict, thankfully, all of them were benign...
Motorcycle accident 1992, Back problems from 92 to 2005. August 2005- early 2006- Chiropractor care
March 2006- consult with surgeon -PLIF/TLIF L4-5, spondylolysthesis, canal and foraminal stenosis, multiple herniations
Post Op Cauda Equina Syndrome
Revision August 2007- salvage op
March 2011- 2nd onset of Cauda Equina Syndrome
Needs surgery to prevent paralysis
Posts.Title: Waiting for the results of second stereotactic biopsy

Posts.Content:
Hi..I usually post in Chronic pain but found that I also need to
Be here, for now. I recently (end of Jan.) had a mammo. Last ones
Before this were 2006 and2007. This new one showed many microcalcifications
In both breasts. Was told I needed to return for more views and bilat
Breast ultrasound. Did that only to get the report that they were
recommending stereotactic biopsy of right breast. Had that two
Fridays ago. Apparently they missed the calcifications completely.
So today I had to repeat the biopsy.
Now I have to wait yet another week for the results...
Sandi
Posts.Title: Waiting for the results of second stereotactic biopsy

Posts.Content:
Thanks Sherbear, 
The worst part of it is that I had two biopsies, one day apart- one thyroid and one for the stereotactic, both came back the same day, 8 hours apart, both completely missed the tissue they were supposed to biopsy..so today was the repeat for the stereo...in a week I guess I will have to repeat the thyroid...
Sandi
Motorcycle accident 1992, Back problems from 92 to 2005. August 2005- early 2006- Chiropractor care
March 2006- consult with surgeon -PLIF/TLIF L4-5, spondylolysthesis, canal and foraminal stenosis, multiple herniations
